data.title: Biography of Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden 1882-1973
data.meta_description: Biography of Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden 1882-1973 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 11 Nov 1882 Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden was born to Gustav V King Sweden 1858-1950 (age 24).

On 15 Jun 1905 Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 22) and Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 23) were married. She the daughter of Prince Arthur Windsor 1st Duke Connaught and Strathearn (age 55) and Luise Margarete Hohenzollern Duchess Connaught (age 44). He the son of Gustav V King Sweden 1858-1950 (age 46). He a great x 5 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a granddaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 22 Apr 1906 [his son] Gustaf Adolf Bernadotte was born to Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 23) and [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 24). He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 07 Jun 1907 [his son] Sigvard Bernadotte was born to Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 24) and [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 25). He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 08 Dec 1907 [his grandfather] King Oscar II of Sweden and Norway 1829-1907 (age 78) died. His son [his father] Gustav V King Sweden 1858-1950 (age 49) succeeded V King Sweden.

On 28 Mar 1910 [his son] Ingrid Bernadotte Queen Consort Denmark 1910-2000 was born to Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 27) and [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 28). He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 28 Feb 1912 [his son] Bertil Bernadotte was born to Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 29) and [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 30). He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 15 Oct 1913 [his brother-in-law] Prince Arthur of Connaught (age 30) and Princess Alexandra Duff Duchess Fife 1891-1959 (age 22) were married at Chapel Royal, St James's Palace. She the daughter of Alexander Duff 1st Duke Fife and Louise Windsor Duchess Fife (age 46). He the son of Prince Arthur Windsor 1st Duke Connaught and Strathearn (age 63) and Luise Margarete Hohenzollern Duchess Connaught (age 53). They were first cousin once removed. He a grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom. She a granddaughter of King Edward VII of the United Kingdom.

On 31 Oct 1916 [his son] Carl Johan Bernadotte was born to Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 33) and [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 34). He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 27 Feb 1919 Alexander Ramsay (age 37) and [his sister-in-law] Victoria Patricia "Patsy" Windsor (age 32) were married at Westminster Abbey [Map]. She the daughter of Prince Arthur Windsor 1st Duke Connaught and Strathearn (age 68) and Luise Margarete Hohenzollern Duchess Connaught. She a granddaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 01 May 1920 [his wife] Margaret "Daisy" Windsor (age 38) died.

On 03 Nov 1923 Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 40) and Louise Mountbatten Queen Consort Sweden (age 34) were married. She the daughter of Prince Louis of Battenburg 1st Marquess Milford Haven 1854-1921 and Victoria Hesse Darmstadt Marchioness Milford Haven (age 60). He the son of Gustav V King Sweden 1858-1950 (age 65). He a great x 5 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great granddaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 20 Oct 1932 [his son] Gustaf Adolf Bernadotte (age 26) and [his daughter-in-law] Sibylla Saxe Coburg Gotha (age 24) were married. He the son of Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden 1882-1973 (age 49) and Margaret "Daisy" Windsor. They were second cousins. He a great grandson of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom. She a great granddaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.

On 12 Sep 1938 [his former brother-in-law] Prince Arthur of Connaught (age 55) died.

On 26 Jan 1947 [his son] Gustaf Adolf Bernadotte (age 40) died in a plane crash.

On 29 Oct 1950 [his father] Gustav V King Sweden 1858-1950 (age 92) died. His son Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 67) succeeded VI King Sweden. [his wife] Louise Mountbatten Queen Consort Sweden (age 61) by marriage Queen Consort Sweden.

On 02 Mar 1965 [his wife] Louise Mountbatten Queen Consort Sweden (age 75) died.

On 05 Dec 1969 [his former sister-in-law] Princess Alice of Battenburg (age 84) died.

On 15 Sep 1973 Gustaf Adolph VI King Sweden (age 90) died. His grandson Carl XVI King Sweden 1946- (age 27) succeeded XVI King Sweden. Silvia Sommerlath Queen Consort Sweden by marriage Queen Consort Sweden.

Andrew Gl√ºcksburg and Princess Alice of Battenburg were married. She the daughter of Prince Louis of Battenburg 1st Marquess Milford Haven 1854-1921 and Victoria Hesse Darmstadt Marchioness Milford Haven. He the son of George I King Greece 1845-1913 and Olga Constantinovna Holstein Gottorp Romanov Queen Consort Greece. He a great x 4 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great granddaughter of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom.
